works.description:
A classifieds website is copying my classifieds to his own website. We have found more similar articles with text and photos. They are also copying the contact data posted by our users! 

The big problem is that they are stealing text, photos and contact information of our registred users. They are also coping the classifieds from other romanian classifieds websites. All the classifieds on bikepedia.ro are published by a single user, torni.

A few examples below.
